name: PhotoChromic
description: "PhotoChromic introduces a unique use case for Non-fungible Tokens (“NFTs”), integrating the NFT with user identity to develop a biometrically-managed model of Self-Sovereign Identity (“SSI”) on the Blockchain. Powered by an ERC-20 token, PhotoChromic gives control and ownership of digital identity back to the user. PhotoChromic empowers people to own, verify, and maintain full control over the sharing and use of their identity and personal information through an NFT. "
